name: Sarah Chen
coverLetter: Passionate full stack developer with 6 years of experience building scalable web applications. I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud architecture, with a strong focus on clean code and user experience. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy mentoring junior developers.

profile: Full stack developer with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, specializing in React and Node.js ecosystems.
Strong background in cloud architecture and DevOps practices, with experience deploying applications on AWS.
Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices in software development.
managementBackground: Led development teams of 3-5 engineers on multiple projects, ensuring code quality and delivery timelines.
Established coding standards and review processes that improved team productivity by 30%.
technicalBackground: Expert in full stack JavaScript development with React, Node.js, and modern database technologies.
Experienced in microservices architecture and containerization with Docker and Kubernetes.

education.title: Master of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Architected and developed microservices-based e-commerce platform serving 100K+ users.
Led migration from monolithic architecture to cloud-native microservices, reducing costs by 40%.
Mentored junior developers and conducted technical interviews for new hires.
Built responsive web applications using React and Express.js.
Implemented real-time features using WebSocket and Socket.io.
Optimized application performance and implemented caching strategies.
